Text:
In the version 1.0 there were some missing scripts, it's fixed now.

Also, someone has asked if this can be played online... The answer is: i have no idea.

I've been playing with bots (CSS v17 from DigitalZone) and it works fine. Probably should work over LAN/Internet, as long as both - the server, as well as the client - have the mod installed.
